backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a food delivery app implementing menu management, order placement/tracking, and customer profile APIs with role-based access control for admin and user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the PIN-based access gate feature for the Courier App, listing the affected files, components, and test IDs with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-to-two sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's React components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React app titled 'The Deccan BHOJAN' that mounts the root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with two routes: '/' for the CustomerPortal (with shared layout) and '/courier' for the standalone CourierApp.
frontend/src/components/AccountView.tsx: Account tab component that shows a sign-in prompt for unauthenticated users or displays a profile edit form and recent order history for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/CartPanel.tsx: Shopping cart panel component displaying cart items with quantity increment/decrement and remove controls, a total, and a checkout button; supports both sidebar and sheet display modes.
frontend/src/components/CheckoutForm.tsx: Renders a checkout form that collects customer name and phone, pre-fills from profile if available, and submits an order via the placeOrder mutation. Shows a login prompt if the user is not authenticated.
frontend/src/components/CourierPinGate.t: Displays a 4-digit PIN entry screen for courier dashboard access, auto-submitting on completion and showing a shake/error animation on incorrect PIN.
frontend/src/components/CustomerNavigati: Sticky top navigation bar for the customer portal with links to Menu, My Orders, and Account views, including a responsive mobile menu and login button.
frontend/src/components/CustomerPortalLa: Layout wrapper for the customer portal that renders child routes via Outlet and includes a footer with branding and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that handles Internet Identity login and logout, showing appropriate loading, sign-in, or sign-out states.
frontend/src/components/MenuManagementSe: Admin section for managing menu items with dialogs to add, edit, delete, and toggle availability of items, backed by React Query mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/MenuSection.tsx: Displays a categorized grid of menu items with add-to-cart and quantity increment/decrement controls, using emoji icons per category.
frontend/src/components/MyOrdersView.tsx: Displays a customer's order history, showing a login prompt if unauthenticated, skeletons while loading, or a sorted list of orders with status badges and item details.
frontend/src/components/OrderCard.tsx: Renders an admin-facing order card with order details, expandable item list, and action buttons to advance the order through status stages or cancel it.
frontend/src/components/OrderConfirmatio: Shows a post-order confirmation screen with a progress stepper visualizing the order's current status and a button to place a new order.
frontend/src/components/OrderFilters.tsx: Renders a horizontal scrollable filter bar for order statuses (all, pending, accepted, etc.) with per-status counts and active highlighting.
frontend/src/components/OrderStatusBadge: Displays a styled pill badge with a pulsing dot for a given OrderStatus, supporting small and medium sizes.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal dialog that collects a new user's name and phone number on first login and saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries whenever the Internet Identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages shopping cart state with sessionStorage persistence, exposing helpers to add, remove, update quantity, and clear items along with total price and item count.
frontend/src/hooks/useCourierAccess.ts: React hook that manages PIN-based courier access using localStorage, exposing grantAccess (validates PIN '1953'), revokeAccess, and hasAccess state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context/hook providing Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, exposing login, clear, identity, and login status state to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating menu items and orders against the backend actor, including queries for menu, orders by ID, and mutations for add/update/delete/toggle.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Tailwind and Google Fonts, defining CSS custom properties for light/dark themes, and utility classes for status badges, hero gradient, card hover, and shake animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/CourierApp.tsx: Courier-facing page protected by a PIN gate that displays all orders with filtering/sorting and a menu management tab, with refresh and lock-out controls.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerPortal.tsx: Customer-facing portal rendering the menu, cart sheet, checkout flow, order confirmation, and account views, with automatic menu seeding and profile setup modal for authenticated users.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with helpers to persist/retrieve values via sessionStorage and clean sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining dark mode, custom color tokens using oklch CSS variables, extended typography/border/shadow/animation settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state snapshot describing two standalone frontend apps (Customer Portal and Courier App) sharing a single Motoko backend, including architectural notes, existing features, known issues, and versioning metadata.
